aircraft.value: Phantom Stealth - AC-2916-354 at Forward Operating Base-1

defect_observed.value: Generator output instability. Abnormality observed during system test.

root_cause.value: Inadequate maintenance procedure resulting in improper installation

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Battery Management component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions. Date: 22/09/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality control procedures verified. Recommend periodic surveillance of manufacturing facility. Date: 23/09/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 25/09/2024 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 26/09/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 27/09/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Major
b) Defect Observed: Generator output instability. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Inadequate maintenance procedure resulting in improper installation
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Battery Management component.
Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.
c) Remedial Measures Update software to latest certified version with bug fixes
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Establish periodic calibration schedule
d) Attributable Code: R - Lapses on the part of Repair Agency/Manufacturer
